Html:
I need a scheduled task to run on logout/shutdown from the currently signed in user (no prompt for credentials)

 

I saw a logon trigger and a sessionstatechange trigger but no logout or shutdown.  How can I make this work?

I don't believe there is a trigger for logout or shutdown. Your best bet is to run a very small executable as a windowless program that detects those events and then fires off the action you want. I am not aware of any way to do it using the task library.
